description: MotoGP 13 is the official videogame of 2013 MotoGP season. It features all the tracks, riders and teams present in MotoGP, Moto2 and Moto3 world championships in the season. There are four game modes: Career, Grand Prix, World Championship and Time Attack. Career is the basic game mode, in it the player starts with Moto3 class and has to work his way up to becoming the champion in the prestigious MotoGP class. The game offers flexible motorbike physics settings and difficulty settings. There's also a dynamic weather system allowing for weather to change during the race. There's a split-screen play option for two players (absent in the PS Vita version) and online multiplayer for up to 12 players (up to six players for PS Vita).
